name: Dark/Night Archive of Our Own
description: A dark/night theme for archiveofourown.org. To make finding and reading fics easier on your eyes. :) Includes options to change font and colours. Also includes support for kudosed and seen history and kudos/hits ratio userscripts. UserCSS version can be found here on GitHub. Additional screenshots can also be found on GitHub. I highly recommend switching to the UserCSS version for more frequent updates (and using Stylus)! Feel free to tell me any suggestions, or let me know about any issues. Enjoy!

user.name: cicerakes
user.about: No updates or responses here, check GitHub for latest updates! My styles aim to: - Darken the colours while keeping most, if not all, of the site's original design. - Optionally hide ads and other potentially unwanted features. - Sometimes both.
